name: AAA & CAA Member Offer
short_description: Take advantage of your membership to save up to 15% on a stay at the exquisite Oceans Edge Resort & Marina!
short_description_detail_page: With your AAA or CAA membership, you can escape for a luxurious stay at Oceans Edge. With this offer, youâ€™ll save up to 15%.
description:
BOOK THIS OFFER AND ENJOY :

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (Downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: Membership ID required at time arrival. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. On-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
